data.comment: The match has started at The Den.
Graeme Shinnie is booked for the away team.
In the minute 45, Darren England blows to end the first-half.
The home team replace Ben Thompson with Troy Parrott.
In the minute 58, Derby County's Krystian Bielik has been booked in London.
Liam Rosenior is making the team's first substitution at The Den with Martyn Waghorn replacing Duane Holmes.
The away team have replaced Graeme Shinnie with Max Bird. This is the second substitution made today by Liam Rosenior.
In the minute 69, Jason Knight is on target to give Derby County a 0-1 advantage.
Tyler Burey is replacing Matt Smith for the home team.
Jon Dadi BÃ¶dvarsson is replacing Shane Ferguson for Millwall at The Den.
In the minute 85, Martyn Waghorn for Derby County has been booked by Darren England and receives a first yellow card.
Nathan Byrne (Derby County) has received a yellow card from Darren England.
Liam Rosenior (Derby County) is making a third substitution, with Lee Buchanan replacing Kazim.
In the minute 89, The home team have replaced Ryan Leonard with Shaun Williams. This is the fourth substitution made today by Gary Rowett.
The match has come to a close in London. The final score is 0-1.
Liam Rosenior is making the team's fourth substitution at The Den with Andre Wisdom replacing Kamil Jozwiak.
